r.d: Yaf is a PHP framework similar to zend framework, which is written in c and built as PHP extension
r.n: - Fixed bug config will not re-loaded even it was modified - Fixed bug segfault occurred if uncaught exception in Yaf_Controller::init - If action return false, dispatch loop will go on with no auto-renderring - Remove inline declarations (-fgnu-c89 on MacOS)
